layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
layer at (8,8) size 44x19
  LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {DIV} at (0,0) size 44x19
    LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {LABEL} at (0,0) size 24x19
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 24x19
        text run at (0,0) width 24: "foo"
    LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 20x19
      LayoutText {#text} at (24,0) size 20x19
        text run at (24,0) width 20: "bar"
    LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
